Wednesday 14 June — 7:30PM

Reginald D Hunter

Tom Stade

Andrew Maxwell

John Robins

One of the most brilliantly unpredictable, hilarious and thought-provoking comedians around - Reginald D Hunter heads to Bristol Comedy Garden. A consistent presence on TV with appearances on Qi, Have I Got News For You and many more - don’t miss this rewardingly provocative award-winner live.

A refreshingly ruminative, searingly honest comedy style Daily Telegraph
Joining Reginald is an all-star supporting cast with Live At The Apollo star and insatiable mischief maker Tom Stade, Ireland’s intrepid social commentator Andrew Maxwell and all-round dude and Radio X presenter John Robins as host.
Festival Opens

18:30

Show Starts

19:30
